publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3514 Sarah Boyack: Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce—That the Parliament congratulates Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce on the recent award of "Most Outstanding Chamber in the World" for the third successive year, announced at the Junior Chamber International (JCI) World Congress in Vienna; believes that this achievement further enhances Scotland’s global reputation for entrepreneurship combined with social responsibility, and commends the JCI network on its work in encouraging young business people to be active citizens through community enterprises, training projects and international initiatives.Supported by: Margaret Smith*

S2M-3514 Sarah Boyack: Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce—That the Parliament congratulates Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce on the recent award of "Most Outstanding Chamber in the World" for the third successive year, announced at the Junior Chamber International (JCI) World Congress in Vienna; believes that this achievement further enhances Scotland’s global reputation for entrepreneurship combined with social responsibility, and commends the JCI network on its work in encouraging young business people to be active citizens through community enterprises, training projects and international initiatives.Supported by: Margaret Smith

S2M-3514 Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce (lodged on 3 November 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Bruce Crawford*, Susan Deacon*, Helen Eadie*, Robin Harper*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Maureen Macmillan*, Margaret Mitchell*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mike Pringle*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3514 Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce (lodged on 3 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-3514 Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce (lodged on 3 November 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-3514 Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce (lodged on 3 November 2005) Trish Godman*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3514 Further Congratulations to Edinburgh Junior Chamber of Commerce (lodged on 3 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
